visual_attributes.lighting: Bright, evenly distributed from ceiling lights and pendant lights
visual_attributes.texture: Smooth surfaces with some textured elements from the coffee table and decorative objects

indian_context.regional_style: Not clearly regional, more of a modern interpretation
traditional_elements: Wall-mounted shelves reminiscent of jharokha element
modern_adaptations: Integration of modern materials and design elements
indian_context.space_utilization: Optimized with multiple functional areas (living, dining, kitchen)
indian_context.cultural_significance: Modern adaptation of traditional Indian architectural elements for a contemporary setting

analysis.description: The interior showcases a modern Indian fusion style with a contemporary living room that seamlessly transitions into a kitchen area. The living room features a U-shaped sofa with a tufted design and wooden accents, complemented by a natural wood coffee table and a modern geometric wall-mounted shelf system. The kitchen area is visible in the background, with a clean, minimalist design featuring white cabinets, green accents, and a marble countertop. The space is well-lit with a combination of recessed ceiling lights and a sleek, contemporary pendant light, creating a bright and airy atmosphere.

metadata.budget_indicator: Moderate to high, with the use of high-end materials such as marble and polished wood
metadata.indian_specific: Integration of traditional wall-mounted shelf design with modern elements
